name: Avoid undocumented Functions
description: Functions should be documented. This reports shows all functions with no comments.
output:
This rule lists all undocumented Functions.
It provides following information:
- Function full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact.
remediation: Add comments into functions to explain what is their goal and how they work.
